description: This file defines the main dashboard page component for managing connections in a web application. It fetches connection data, displays connection cards with status, actions, and navigation links, and handles user interactions like validate and revoke. It uses React hooks, custom components, and API functions to provide dynamic and responsive UI.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of connections from the backend and updates state.

methods.name: onValidate
methods.description: Handles the validation action for a specific connection.

methods.name: onRevoke
methods.description: Handles the revocation action for a specific connection.
